name: Superior Rune of Radiance

bonuses: When you receive an aura, you gain 5 seconds of swiftness. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>
When you use a heal skill, you gain 4 seconds of light aura. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>
The duration of auras you apply are increased by 33%.

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Superior Sigil of Cruelty

buff.description:
Gain a charge of +10 ferocity each time you kill a foe—five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

description:
<c=@flavor>The sugar in this candy will go straight to your head.</c>
Consuming this item leaves a shiny foil candy wrapper, which is highly prized by skritt.

name: Ghostly Mail Courier
description: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to customize the way they send mail to other players and receive game mail.

name: Superior Rune of Evasion

bonuses: When executing a dodge roll, you gain 3 seconds of swiftness. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When executing a dodge roll, you gain 3 seconds of fury. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
When executing a dodge roll, deal a crippling strike to nearby enemies. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
